title: Making Amends
overview: A shrewd, ruthless business man by day, a lying, cheating husband by night. Such is the life of Sean (Randy Spears). His self serving attitude and marital indiscretions make him an unpopular man, not that he cares. Until something happens that changes everything. An accident gives him renewed life and passion, especially for his beautiful and forgiving wife Danika (Mikayla Mendez). But is it too late to make amends?
